awards.text: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 nomination.

fullplot: Phileas Fogg accepts a wager to prove his contention that a man can go around the world in 80 days. After betting his entire fortune, he takes his new butler (a man hoping for a quite life) on a tour of the world. However, just before the time he leaves, the Bank of England is robbed and a Detective believes that Fogg is the guilty party and he sets out after him.
plot: A Victorian Age English gentleman takes a wager that he can circle the globe in the unprecedented time of just 80 days.
title: Around the World in 80 Days
